Bug Fixes Applied - Summary

Overview

This document summarizes all bug fixes and improvements applied during the comprehensive code review and security audit.

‚úÖ CRITICAL FIXES APPLIED

1. Fixed useEffect Dependencies (React Bug)

Files Modified: - src/components/carbon/ApiKeyWarningBanner.tsx - src/components/carbon/SupabaseHealthCheck.tsx

Changes: - Wrapped checkApiKeys() in useCallback with proper dependencies - Wrapped checkHealth() in useCallback with proper dependencies - Added functions to useEffect dependency arrays - Added isMountedRef to prevent state updates on unmounted components

Impact: Eliminates stale closures, prevents memory leaks, ensures correct behavior

2. Fixed Memory Leak in SupabaseHealthCheck

File: src/components/carbon/SupabaseHealthCheck.tsx

Changes: - Added isMountedRef to track component mount status - Added checks before all setState calls to prevent updates on unmounted components - Properly cleanup interval on unmount

Impact: Prevents memory leaks and unnecessary API calls after component unmounts

3. Improved Race Condition in FeedbackModal

File: src/components/carbon/FeedbackModal.tsx

Changes: - Increased success message timeout from 2s to 3s - Added ‚ÄúThis dialog will close automatically‚Äù to success message - Made success notification non-dismissible during auto-close

Impact: Better UX, users can see success confirmation before modal closes

4. Added Input Validation (Security & Data Integrity)

Files Modified: - src/components/carbon/ApiKeysSettingsModal.tsx - src/components/carbon/FeedbackModal.tsx

ApiKeysSettingsModal Changes: - Added validateInputs() function - Validates API key minimum length (20 characters) - Validates URLs start with https:// - Ensures at least one API key is provided - Clears errors when user starts typing - Disables show/hide buttons during loading

FeedbackModal Changes: - Added validateInputs() function - Validates title length (5-200 characters) - Validates description length (10-2000 characters) - Basic XSS prevention (detects script tags and event handlers) - Added character counters for title and description - Added real-time validation feedback - Clears errors when user starts typing

Impact: Prevents invalid data, improves security, better UX

‚úÖ HIGH PRIORITY FIXES APPLIED

5. API Key Encryption Migration Created

File: supabase/migrations/20251112190000_add_api_key_encryption.sql

Changes: - Created encryption/decryption functions using pgcrypto - Added encrypt_api_key() function using AES-256 - Added decrypt_api_key() function - Created user_api_keys_decrypted view for authorized access - Added trigger function for automatic encryption (commented out for safety) - Included setup instructions for encryption key management

Status: Migration created but not yet applied (requires encryption key setup)

Next Steps: 1. Generate encryption key: openssl rand -base64 32 2. Set in Supabase: ALTER DATABASE postgres SET app.encryption_key = 'your-key-here'; 3. Apply migration 4. Uncomment trigger to enable automatic encryption

Impact: Addresses CRITICAL security vulnerability of plain-text API key storage

üìã REMAINING ISSUES TO ADDRESS

High Priority

    • Currently hardcoded in src/integrations/supabase/client.ts
    • Should use VITE_SUPABASE_URL and VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
    • No error boundaries to catch component errors
    • Single component error crashes entire app
    • Multiple files using as any bypassing TypeScript
    • Need proper TypeScript type definitions

Medium Priority

    • No retry mechanism for network failures
    • Implement exponential backoff
    • Inconsistent error handling patterns across components
    • Some errors logged, some thrown, some ignored
    • ApiKeysSettingsModal needs visual feedback during save
    • Add loading spinner or progress indicator

Low Priority

    • Missing ARIA labels for screen readers
    • Improve keyboard navigation
    • No rate limiting on feedback submission
    • No rate limiting on API key updates
    • Magic numbers (2000ms, 30000ms, 1500ms) scattered in code
    • Create constants file for maintainability
